name: Substancia
description:
A spry adventurer.

A devoted priest.

An exhausted gunslinger.

Follow this band of adventurers as they progress through a tower of mold and decay.

Use the mouse to select cards to attack enemies and buff your party. Defeat all enemies to advance to the next floor. 

Thanks for playing!

Credits:

Made using the Unity Engine

AI Generated Images were created using Open Source models and data sets
